answers.answer: With my first I had bad pain for 3 days before I went into labor they kept sending me home. My second was the same day pain and labor. This one I been having pain off and on for a week so I have no idea what's going to happen. I am so ready and I'm only 36 weeks.
Idk which home remedy works but which ever one i tried its working bc these pains are making me bout to cry now...

I feel your pain hun my doc wants me to go 40wks+..I've already visited the e.r with contractions 2-4 mins apart, she's transverse and I have group b strep . The damn doctor still wants me to wait it out until I can no longer. I'm. 36+4.
Go to a different hospital and tell them you think it's time. No hospital can turn you away when your in labor. they might even break your water and speed.it up. Why did they need to do a.c.section??

A couple of them off this website it says 40 ways to induce labor, i did the spicy salad with extra oil and vinigar some raspberry tea, walking around and walking up and down stairs and i was going to try the hot bath to see what that does alsoI had preeclampsia my first pregnancy and had an emergency csection at 32 weeks.
I thought about going to a different hospital i got to make sure i havea  ride home before i get there just incase the do send me home.

question: Went to the dr this morning and ended up walking out after they changed my csection date for the third time, on top of that they didnt do anything they were suppose to do even after i asked them and told them what was wrong with me. Now im sitting at home in pain still all bc i stay an hour away from the hospital with no transpertation, my contractions are about 10-13 minutes apart now and lasting about 35-40 seconds along with pressure and it hurts so bad i want to scream, i want to just go to a totally different hospital and see what they say. Im just so frustrated and tired, i want my old dr back bc she did stuff the right way if i had the money i would dang show go to her asap. Im 37 weeks tomorrow and they want me to go to 40 weeks even after the lady dr i seen wrote on my chart 37 1/2 weeks is when i get my csection. I dont know what to do.
title: venting
